title: Bug 17242[View Mgmt] Inconsistency dragging fast views
description: Build: 20020521Steps:1. Make a view a fast view (leaving several views as nonfast views).2. Maximize an editor.3. Minimize the fast view.4. Drag the fast view icon over the maximized editor.The editor should be restored to it's original size so the user has theoppertunity to drag the fast view over one of the other views. This is whatoccurs when the user drags the icon of an active (nonminimized) fast view whenan editor is maximized.
